summary_of_book.label: 128² Prod. v1.31.5
summary_of_book.description: collection of blueprints used in the AssemblyStorm weekly server.

1.label: rush to bots v4(c).1
1.description:
v4(c).1
jan/16 | by the AssemblyStorm server crew

variant of RtB with a unified starter-mall for easier train-mall bootstrapping.
(step 1 can be built manually, but subsequent steps should be built by bots)

Thanks.
I deeply appreciate the help of the following people:
* Nefrums: https://bit.ly/2DGGbLW
* flame_sla: for the original RtB and generally being awesome <3

2.label: 128² rails v0.2.5b
2.description:
chunk-aligned LHD rail system for 11-long trains.
by the AssemblyStorm server crew 
v0.2.5b | 07/december/2023

[color=#ff8000]taxi sez:[/color] [color=yellow]only YOU can prevent congestion![/color]
[color=#FFFF00]• Plan and organize the rail network so that the number of intersections decreases as expected traffic increases:[/color] 
[color=yellow]- high traffic areas should have just a few spread-apart intersections; 
- low traffic areas can have several close-by intersections.[/color]

3.label: 32² walls v1.1.3
3.description:
modular defense wall designed to integrate with [font=default-bold]128² rails[/font].
for best results, make use of the corner pieces to connect diagonal and perpendicular sections, especially concave corners!

by the AssemblyStorm server crew
version 1.1.3 (12/23)

5.label: modular early miners v1.1
5.description:
fluid loaders can be used throughout the whole game.
also includes some landfill-outpost stuff.

how to use:
- cover the ore patch with miners
- use a connector to bring belts together
- attach an unloader to the belts (using 8belt prints if needed)
- autobuilder can be placed if MINEBUILDER trains are running
- upgrade belts and/or remove module requests as necessary
- lastly, rename the stop for the appropriate ore type

for uranium mines, use the appropriate versions of connector/loader

11.label: Grid-Nuclear v2023-11-30.01
11.description:
Based on DoctroSix's "Nuclear With Landfill" v2020-08-26.01

+ Morsk's changes 2020-11-27.

13.label: Ultrakill Modules v5_rc3
13.description:

by the Assemblystorm server crew
v5_release-candidate-3 | 2023-dec-11

14.label: Megamall-in-one v7.4
14.description:
designed to integrate with 128² rails
original design by the AssemblyStorm server crew
version7 by taxi (special thanks to flame_sla)

2024-01-03
- all landfill has been moved to step-1
- added accu/panel unloader & solagrido loader
- reworked landfill-production station:
-- should empty trains more consistently
-- will now drain excess stone out of storage
- increased graveyard capacity
- added toggles for tier3 module production (default off except for eff3)
- added alarms for wood storage

15.label: SolaGrido v1.1
15.description:
hybrid solar deployment system based on (and that attempts to unify):
- [color=blue]Solarado 0.9.0[/color] by darklich14 and blooper
- [color=blue]SOLAR GRID 0.2[/color] by NaOida

design refined over the years by the AssemblyStorm server crew
v1 grafted by taxi

v1.1 | 2024-01-03 
- Solagrido trains will now be handled by the megamall (v7.4 and up)
- [L]oadegrido will now export products to the megamall only
- Solagrido unloaders will now use standard 1-2 trash trains!

17.label: End Game 4-Stop Modular Mines v1.4.4
17.description:
by the AssemblyStorm server crew

Place the blades first, then entry lanes, then stacker and exits

2023-12-27 - added bots to unloader requests; connected stray power network
2023-12-07 - updated minebuilder unloader
2023-12-01 - restyle upgradeplanners & book icons
2023-11-30 - added grid snapping to blades, hacked 'ports
2023-11-23 - Grouped prints by type. Wired entry signals to poles. Remade minebuilder. Added Uranium pre-built & 8-wagon blade.
<snip old log>
